TEXT.TITLE: TPA OF AMERICA INC <TPS> 4TH QTR LOSS
TEXT.BODY: Shr loss five cts Net loss 753,000 Revs 8,932,000 Avg shrs 16.0 mln Year Shr loss seven cts Net loss 995,000 Revs 27.9 mln Avg shrs 14.8 mln NOTE: Company started operating in August 1985. Results reflect change in fiscal year from November 30 end. Reuter
